name: Gallantin: Retro Space Shooter
description:
Classic Shoot ‘em up!

Face enemy spaceships and towers!

Challenging levels!

110 difficult levels!

Retro space shooter look!

Pixel art and white noise effects!

Upgrades!

Unlock new skills and weapon when you complete more levels!

Bosses!

Face and destroy unique bosses! There are 10 of them!

Survival mode!

Finish all the levels and compete for the highest score with other players!
